name: Monthly Leave Details
query:
SELECT `tabAttendance`.`employee` AS "User ID:Link/Employee:100",
       `tabAttendance`.`employee_name` AS "Name:Data:100",
         `tabEmployee`.designation AS "Designation:Data:100",
        (CASE 
         WHEN `tabAttendance`.status = "Absent" THEN GROUP_CONCAT(DAY(`tabAttendance`.attendance_date))
         ELSE 
         CASE
          WHEN `tabAttendance`.status = "Half Day" THEN GROUP_CONCAT(DAY(`tabAttendance`.attendance_date))
         ELSE "-"
        END
        END) AS "Leave Dates:Data:200",
        COUNT(`tabAttendance`.attendance_date) AS "Total Days::200"
FROM `tabAttendance` 
LEFT JOIN `tabEmployee` on `tabAttendance`.employee = `tabEmployee`.employee
WHERE `tabAttendance`.status = "Absent" OR `tabAttendance`.status = "Half Day"
GROUP BY `tabAttendance`.`employee`
